Spears::

She looked at Firearm.  Tears were starting to well up in her 
eyes. "No" she whispered.  She felt her spark breaking. She sat down 
on the table and stared of into space. She shook her head as the 
tears rolled down her cheeks. "No...no..no, he can't be gone. He just 
can't be gone. Oh holy matrix, no, please no." She covered her face 
with her hands and cried uncontrollably. From what she was told, her 
love was lost to her, forever.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm sadly shakes his head. It was obvious that Spears had cared 
> for Striker in some way.
> 
> "The device we used to disable the Trainer chip in you didn't work 
on 
> Striker at all. He might have been reprogrammed, in which case they 
> probably cleared his memory. If that's true, there's not way to get 
> him back."
> 
> He pats her on the shoulder, "I'm really sorry about what happened."
>
